ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.Name = 'Provider', CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "EDRD"), OR( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(PersonOtherPhone)), NOT(ISNUMBER(PersonOtherPhone)) ), AND( NOT(ISBLANK(PersonHomePhone)), NOT(ISNUMBER(PersonHomePhone)) ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter the digit only for Other Phone and Home Phone.
